item.description:
Let's meet up for Happy Hour every 1st Friday of the Month. I'll update each one as it gets closer with a place and a host. Stop by, for a few minutes, or all night. Its a great time to come meet new folks.

Check out their incredible, extensive list of martinis here: http://www.venetianmoon.com/menu/drink-menu/   They also have delicious tapas!   Each person is responsible for their own food/drink purchases.  It's best if you bring cash but you can also run a credit card tab.  Please be courteous to our server and tip well - they do a LOT of running around with 20+ members of our group all ordering things throughout the evening!
item.why: Just head straight down the stairs and then to your left in the corner of the downstairs room. I'll arrive early so the staff knows we plan to have a big group in the room.
item.name: Happy Hour - First Friday - Venetian Moon again - in Reading!
